title: Gladitorcomeback
author: Gladitorcomeback
created_time: June 04, 2023, 10:28:29 AMLast edit: June 09, 2023, 06:03:07 AM by Gladitorcomeback
content: I created this thread for buying those coins which not listed in the market yet. currently i am buying just three coins which are not listed and teams working on their product. it's not guaranteed that these tokens will be listed or will end with scam. I know it's risky to buy but i have some vendors who ar buying unofficially.Currently buying Tokens 1: ATM (Athos Meta) 2: PI3: Mises Browser TokensPayment method:Binance (UID)TRX,BNB USDT(Tron, BSC, Matic)Current rate(09 June 2023)ATM= 0.1$ 0.09$PI= 0.48$Mises: 0.08$Escrow:We will use Bounty Portal Telegram group own by Mr irfan (Trusted member) for safe deal.Official group: @officialbountyportalBuying selling group: @bptradesPrevious Trade:Till now i have dealt one through middle man Albon and bought 450$  900$ worth of token.Proof: https://t.me/Officialbountyportal/125115My Telegram: @Gladitorcomeback (Double check before trading)

comments.body: Quote from: Gladitorcomeback on June 04, 2023, 10:28:29 AMI created this thread for buying those coins which not listed in the market yet. currently i am buying just three coins which are not listed and teams working on their product. it's not guaranteed that these tokens will be listed or will end with scam. I know it's risky to buy but i have some vendors who ar buying unofficially.This seems interesting as you are risking your money in coins that are not on exchanges to trade. There will be no guarantee that these will be listed, so i hope you are well aware of the risk you are accepting here. Especially this PI token which has a big hype, I smell a big scam in this project, but nothing can be said with guarantee.Do you only buy these tokens listed here or other bounty tokens too?

So, it's like OP serves as a middleman which means he's not actually going to hold the coins.That's even more strange as to whom he is selling the token when they are not listed anywhere and why would anyone would be willing to buy these tokens. comments.author: Gladitorcomeback
comments.body: Quote from: UmerIdrees on June 06, 2023, 03:16:44 AMThis seems interesting as you are risking your money in coins that are not on exchanges to trade. There will be no guarantee that these will be listed, so i hope you are well aware of the risk you are accepting here. Especially this PI token which has a big hype, I smell a big scam in this project, but nothing can be said with guarantee. actually risk is not big as i am not holding it for long time i am selling to third person with very small commission. The risk with these coins is these coin coins price can be dropped any time hard because they are not listed in any official exchange and unofficial buyers are not in great numbers. if these limited buyers stopped to buy coins then i cannot sell.PI token is very amazing. Their team playing with users. most of users KYC option is not available yet while some user who successfully done their kyc , their token not recieved yet. i am also waiting for token for twi months (Kyc task completed 2 months ago). anyways people are still expecting 1$ price atleast just like SuI. Quote from: UmerIdrees on June 06, 2023, 03:16:44 AMDo you only buy these tokens listed here or other bounty tokens too?I am buying these mentioned coins this time and will add other if i saw any profit in any coin. i think you have some coins from bounty you want to sell.Quote from: UmerIdrees on June 06, 2023, 03:22:30 PMThat's even more strange as to whom he is selling the token when they are not listed anywhere and why would anyone would be willing to buy these tokens. Is he from bitcointalk who is buying these tokens from the OP.Also, if the OP is acting as a middleman, this means he is keeping his profit while selling them to the buyer. This inclusion of the middleman makes the token purchase even more expensive   Main buyer are buying to hold and waiting for mainnet launch. This is high risk but can be profitable also. If you remember TWT(trust wallet token) token was sold unofficially in this way when it was not listed and people sold very cheap. when it's listed, gives buyer 100x profit and buyer are expecting same with PI and other coin so .My commission is very small and perhaps i am giving higher rate than any other people i know. The real buyer will be offering more but don't know who is buying in bulk.
